body:
I get what you saying here, maybe we need to create another directory which storage all the graph and checkpoint by the model name and type
 for example
/tmp/data/mnist/input_data
/tmp/data/mnist/output_data
/tmp/data/imagenet/input_data
/tmp/data/imagenet/output_data
so that when we run different model in a day we don't need to remove the other graph file to make it clean
